sentence: (d) PRM Travel.--For the purposes of this rule regarding       staff foreign travel, the officially-designated personal       representative of the member pursuant to rule 14(b), shall be       deemed to have the same rights, duties, and responsibilities       as members of the staff of the Committee on Foreign       Relations.
